RelatedSentence: Universal Studios has completed filming Fast & Furious 7 , which was shot in the UAE with the support of twofour54 intaj .
Universal Studios has completed filming Fast & Furious 7 , which was shot in the UAE with the support of twofour54 intaj .

Filming of the seventh installment of the action series began in Abu Dhabi in November 2013 , when a visual effects crew captured helicopter shots , stunt footage and visual effects scenes at Abu Dhabi landmarks with twofour54 intaj providing the production services .
